moves.name: pound
moves.text_entry: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

moves.name: karate-chop
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: double-slap
moves.text_entry: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moves.name: comet-punch
moves.text_entry: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

moves.name: mega-punch
moves.text_entry: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

moves.name: pay-day
moves.text_entry: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

moves.name: fire-punch
moves.text_entry: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: ice-punch
moves.text_entry: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: thunder-punch
moves.text_entry: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: scratch
moves.text_entry: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: vice-grip
moves.text_entry: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

moves.name: guillotine
moves.text_entry: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: razor-wind
moves.text_entry: In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: swords-dance
moves.text_entry: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

moves.name: cut
moves.text_entry: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

moves.name: gust
moves.text_entry: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: wing-attack
moves.text_entry: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

moves.name: whirlwind
moves.text_entry: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: fly
moves.text_entry: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.

moves.name: bind
moves.text_entry: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: slam
moves.text_entry: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

moves.name: vine-whip
moves.text_entry: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

moves.name: stomp
moves.text_entry: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: double-kick
moves.text_entry: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

moves.name: mega-kick
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

moves.name: jump-kick
moves.text_entry: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

moves.name: rolling-kick
moves.text_entry: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: sand-attack
moves.text_entry: Sand is hurled in the target’s face, reducing the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: headbutt
moves.text_entry: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: horn-attack
moves.text_entry: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

moves.name: fury-attack
moves.text_entry: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moves.name: horn-drill
moves.text_entry: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: tackle
moves.text_entry: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: body-slam
moves.text_entry: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: wrap
moves.text_entry: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and  squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: take-down
moves.text_entry: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: thrash
moves.text_entry: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: double-edge
moves.text_entry: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: tail-whip
moves.text_entry: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: poison-sting
moves.text_entry: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: twineedle
moves.text_entry: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: pin-missile
moves.text_entry: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: leer
moves.text_entry: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

moves.name: bite
moves.text_entry: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: growl
moves.text_entry: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.

moves.name: roar
moves.text_entry: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: sing
moves.text_entry: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

moves.name: supersonic
moves.text_entry: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

moves.name: sonic-boom
moves.text_entry: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

moves.name: disable
moves.text_entry: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: acid
moves.text_entry: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: ember
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: flamethrower
moves.text_entry: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: mist
moves.text_entry: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

moves.name: water-gun
moves.text_entry: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: hydro-pump
moves.text_entry: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: surf
moves.text_entry: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

moves.name: ice-beam
moves.text_entry: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: blizzard
moves.text_entry: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

moves.name: psybeam
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: bubble-beam
moves.text_entry: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.

moves.name: aurora-beam
moves.text_entry: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

moves.name: hyper-beam
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: peck
moves.text_entry: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: drill-peck
moves.text_entry: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

moves.name: submission
moves.text_entry: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: low-kick
moves.text_entry: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: counter
moves.text_entry: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: seismic-toss
moves.text_entry: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

moves.name: strength
moves.text_entry: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

moves.name: absorb
moves.text_entry: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: mega-drain
moves.text_entry: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: leech-seed
moves.text_entry: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

moves.name: growth
moves.text_entry: The user’s body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: razor-leaf
moves.text_entry: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: solar-beam
moves.text_entry: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

moves.name: poison-powder
moves.text_entry: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

moves.name: stun-spore
moves.text_entry: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

moves.name: sleep-powder
moves.text_entry: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

moves.name: petal-dance
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: string-shot
moves.text_entry: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

moves.name: dragon-rage
moves.text_entry: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

moves.name: fire-spin
moves.text_entry: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: thunder-shock
moves.text_entry: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: thunderbolt
moves.text_entry: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: thunder-wave
moves.text_entry: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

moves.name: thunder
moves.text_entry: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: rock-throw
moves.text_entry: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

moves.name: earthquake
moves.text_entry: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

moves.name: fissure
moves.text_entry: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: dig
moves.text_entry: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.

moves.name: toxic
moves.text_entry: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

moves.name: confusion
moves.text_entry: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: psychic
moves.text_entry: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: hypnosis
moves.text_entry: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moves.name: meditate
moves.text_entry: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

moves.name: agility
moves.text_entry: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

moves.name: quick-attack
moves.text_entry: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

moves.name: rage
moves.text_entry: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

moves.name: teleport
moves.text_entry: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon.

moves.name: night-shade
moves.text_entry: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

moves.name: mimic
moves.text_entry: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

moves.name: screech
moves.text_entry: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: double-team
moves.text_entry: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: recover
moves.text_entry: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

moves.name: harden
moves.text_entry: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: minimize
moves.text_entry: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

moves.name: smokescreen
moves.text_entry: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: confuse-ray
moves.text_entry: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: withdraw
moves.text_entry: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: defense-curl
moves.text_entry: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: barrier
moves.text_entry: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

moves.name: light-screen
moves.text_entry: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: haze
moves.text_entry: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: reflect
moves.text_entry: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

moves.name: focus-energy
moves.text_entry: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: bide
moves.text_entry: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: metronome
moves.text_entry: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

moves.name: mirror-move
moves.text_entry: The user counters the target by mimicking the target’s last move.

moves.name: self-destruct
moves.text_entry: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: egg-bomb
moves.text_entry: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

moves.name: lick
moves.text_entry: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: smog
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: sludge
moves.text_entry: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: bone-club
moves.text_entry: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: fire-blast
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: waterfall
moves.text_entry: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

moves.name: clamp
moves.text_entry: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user’s very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

moves.name: swift
moves.text_entry: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

moves.name: skull-bash
moves.text_entry: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

moves.name: spike-cannon
moves.text_entry: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: constrict
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target’s  Speed stat.

moves.name: amnesia
moves.text_entry: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: kinesis
moves.text_entry: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: soft-boiled
moves.text_entry: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: high-jump-kick
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

moves.name: glare
moves.text_entry: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

moves.name: dream-eater
moves.text_entry: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.

moves.name: poison-gas
moves.text_entry: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those hit.

moves.name: barrage
moves.text_entry: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

moves.name: leech-life
moves.text_entry: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: lovely-kiss
moves.text_entry: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

moves.name: sky-attack
moves.text_entry: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: transform
moves.text_entry: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

moves.name: bubble
moves.text_entry: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.

moves.name: dizzy-punch
moves.text_entry: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: spore
moves.text_entry: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

moves.name: flash
moves.text_entry: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: psywave
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

moves.name: splash
moves.text_entry: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

moves.name: acid-armor
moves.text_entry: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: crabhammer
moves.text_entry: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: explosion
moves.text_entry: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: fury-swipes
moves.text_entry: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

moves.name: bonemerang
moves.text_entry: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice—coming and going.

moves.name: rest
moves.text_entry: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.

moves.name: rock-slide
moves.text_entry: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

moves.name: hyper-fang
moves.text_entry: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: sharpen
moves.text_entry: The user makes its edges more jagged,  which raises its Attack stat.

moves.name: conversion
moves.text_entry: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

moves.name: tri-attack
moves.text_entry: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

moves.name: super-fang
moves.text_entry: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

moves.name: slash
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: substitute
moves.text_entry: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.

moves.name: struggle
moves.text_entry: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: sketch
moves.text_entry: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

moves.name: triple-kick
moves.text_entry: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

moves.name: thief
moves.text_entry: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.

moves.name: spider-web
moves.text_entry: The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can’t flee from battle.

moves.name: mind-reader
moves.text_entry: The user senses the target’s movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

moves.name: nightmare
moves.text_entry: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

moves.name: flame-wheel
moves.text_entry: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: snore
moves.text_entry: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: curse
moves.text_entry: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: flail
moves.text_entry: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: conversion-2
moves.text_entry: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

moves.name: aeroblast
moves.text_entry: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: cotton-spore
moves.text_entry: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stat.

moves.name: reversal
moves.text_entry: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: spite
moves.text_entry: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

moves.name: powder-snow
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: protect
moves.text_entry: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: mach-punch
moves.text_entry: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: scary-face
moves.text_entry: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

moves.name: feint-attack
moves.text_entry: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

moves.name: sweet-kiss
moves.text_entry: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

moves.name: belly-drum
moves.text_entry: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

moves.name: sludge-bomb
moves.text_entry: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: mud-slap
moves.text_entry: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: octazooka
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face or eyes. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: spikes
moves.text_entry: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team’s feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: zap-cannon
moves.text_entry: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

moves.name: foresight
moves.text_entry: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: destiny-bond
moves.text_entry: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: perish-song
moves.text_entry: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

moves.name: icy-wind
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.

moves.name: detect
moves.text_entry: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: bone-rush
moves.text_entry: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

moves.name: lock-on
moves.text_entry: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the next attack does not miss the target.

moves.name: outrage
moves.text_entry: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: sandstorm
moves.text_entry: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

moves.name: giga-drain
moves.text_entry: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: endure
moves.text_entry: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: charm
moves.text_entry: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its Attack stat.

moves.name: rollout
moves.text_entry: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

moves.name: false-swipe
moves.text_entry: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: swagger
moves.text_entry: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.

moves.name: milk-drink
moves.text_entry: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: spark
moves.text_entry: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: fury-cutter
moves.text_entry: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

moves.name: steel-wing
moves.text_entry: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

moves.name: mean-look
moves.text_entry: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: attract
moves.text_entry: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

moves.name: sleep-talk
moves.text_entry: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

moves.name: heal-bell
moves.text_entry: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party Pokémon.

moves.name: return
moves.text_entry: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

moves.name: present
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

moves.name: frustration
moves.text_entry: This full-power attack grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

moves.name: safeguard
moves.text_entry: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

moves.name: pain-split
moves.text_entry: The user adds its HP to the target’s HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

moves.name: sacred-fire
moves.text_entry: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: magnitude
moves.text_entry: The user attacks everything around it with a ground-shaking quake. Its power varies.

moves.name: dynamic-punch
moves.text_entry: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

moves.name: megahorn
moves.text_entry: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

moves.name: dragon-breath
moves.text_entry: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: baton-pass
moves.text_entry: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

moves.name: encore
moves.text_entry: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

moves.name: pursuit
moves.text_entry: The power of this attack move is doubled if it’s used on a target that’s switching out of battle.

moves.name: rapid-spin
moves.text_entry: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

moves.name: sweet-scent
moves.text_entry: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon’s evasiveness.

moves.name: iron-tail
moves.text_entry: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: metal-claw
moves.text_entry: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

moves.name: vital-throw
moves.text_entry: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.

moves.name: morning-sun
moves.text_entry: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: synthesis
moves.text_entry: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: moonlight
moves.text_entry: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: hidden-power
moves.text_entry: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.

moves.name: cross-chop
moves.text_entry: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: twister
moves.text_entry: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

moves.name: rain-dance
moves.text_entry: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers the power of Fire-type moves.

moves.name: sunny-day
moves.text_entry: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.

moves.name: crunch
moves.text_entry: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: mirror-coat
moves.text_entry: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: psych-up
moves.text_entry: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

moves.name: extreme-speed
moves.text_entry: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: ancient-power
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

moves.name: shadow-ball
moves.text_entry: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: future-sight
moves.text_entry: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: rock-smash
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: whirlpool
moves.text_entry: The user traps the target in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

moves.name: beat-up
moves.text_entry: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

moves.name: fake-out
moves.text_entry: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: uproar
moves.text_entry: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

moves.name: stockpile
moves.text_entry: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used three times.

moves.name: spit-up
moves.text_entry: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: swallow
moves.text_entry: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

moves.name: heat-wave
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.

moves.name: hail
moves.text_entry: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

moves.name: torment
moves.text_entry: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

moves.name: flatter
moves.text_entry: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: will-o-wisp
moves.text_entry: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

moves.name: memento
moves.text_entry: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: facade
moves.text_entry: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

moves.name: focus-punch
moves.text_entry: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

moves.name: smelling-salts
moves.text_entry: This attack’s power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.

moves.name: follow-me
moves.text_entry: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

moves.name: nature-power
moves.text_entry: This attack makes use of nature’s power. Its effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

moves.name: charge
moves.text_entry: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: taunt
moves.text_entry: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: helping-hand
moves.text_entry: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally’s attack.

moves.name: trick
moves.text_entry: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

moves.name: role-play
moves.text_entry: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target’s natural Ability.

moves.name: wish
moves.text_entry: One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its replacement’s HP is restored by half the user’s max HP.

moves.name: assist
moves.text_entry: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by ally Pokémon.

moves.name: ingrain
moves.text_entry: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it’s rooted, it can’t switch out.

moves.name: superpower
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: magic-coat
moves.text_entry: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

moves.name: recycle
moves.text_entry: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

moves.name: revenge
moves.text_entry: This attack move’s power is doubled if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

moves.name: brick-break
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

moves.name: yawn
moves.text_entry: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

moves.name: knock-off
moves.text_entry: The user slaps down the target’s held item, and that item can’t be used in that battle. The move does more damage if the target has a held item.

moves.name: endeavor
moves.text_entry: This attack move cuts down the target’s HP to equal the user’s HP.

moves.name: eruption
moves.text_entry: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

moves.name: skill-swap
moves.text_entry: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

moves.name: imprison
moves.text_entry: If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

moves.name: refresh
moves.text_entry: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn, or paralysis.

moves.name: grudge
moves.text_entry: If the user faints, the user’s grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent’s move that knocked it out.

moves.name: snatch
moves.text_entry: The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a healing or stat-changing move.

moves.name: secret-power
moves.text_entry: The additional effects of this attack depend upon where it was used.

moves.name: dive
moves.text_entry: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

moves.name: arm-thrust
moves.text_entry: The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: camouflage
moves.text_entry: The user’s type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in a cave.

moves.name: tail-glow
moves.text_entry: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: luster-purge
moves.text_entry: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: mist-ball
moves.text_entry: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: feather-dance
moves.text_entry: The user covers the target’s body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

moves.name: teeter-dance
moves.text_entry: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.

moves.name: blaze-kick
moves.text_entry: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: mud-sport
moves.text_entry: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

moves.name: ice-ball
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target for five turns. The move’s power increases each time it hits.

moves.name: needle-arm
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: slack-off
moves.text_entry: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: hyper-voice
moves.text_entry: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

moves.name: poison-fang
moves.text_entry: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

moves.name: crush-claw
moves.text_entry: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: blast-burn
moves.text_entry: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: hydro-cannon
moves.text_entry: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: meteor-mash
moves.text_entry: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

moves.name: astonish
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: weather-ball
moves.text_entry: This attack move varies in power and type depending on the weather.

moves.name: aromatherapy
moves.text_entry: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.

moves.name: fake-tears
moves.text_entry: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: air-cutter
moves.text_entry: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: overheat
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: odor-sleuth
moves.text_entry: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: rock-tomb
moves.text_entry: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.

moves.name: silver-wind
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats.

moves.name: metal-sound
moves.text_entry: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: grass-whistle
moves.text_entry: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

moves.name: tickle
moves.text_entry: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: cosmic-power
moves.text_entry: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: water-spout
moves.text_entry: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

moves.name: signal-beam
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: shadow-punch
moves.text_entry: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

moves.name: extrasensory
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: sky-uppercut
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

moves.name: sand-tomb
moves.text_entry: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

moves.name: sheer-cold
moves.text_entry: The target faints instantly. It’s less likely to hit the target if it’s used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

moves.name: muddy-water
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

moves.name: bullet-seed
moves.text_entry: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

moves.name: aerial-ace
moves.text_entry: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

moves.name: icicle-spear
moves.text_entry: The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to five times in a row.

moves.name: iron-defense
moves.text_entry: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: block
moves.text_entry: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

moves.name: howl
moves.text_entry: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, which raises its Attack stat.

moves.name: dragon-claw
moves.text_entry: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

moves.name: frenzy-plant
moves.text_entry: The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: bulk-up
moves.text_entry: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: bounce
moves.text_entry: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: mud-shot
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

moves.name: poison-tail
moves.text_entry: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: covet
moves.text_entry: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target’s held item.

moves.name: volt-tackle
moves.text_entry: The user electrifies itself and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: magical-leaf
moves.text_entry: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

moves.name: water-sport
moves.text_entry: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

moves.name: calm-mind
moves.text_entry: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: leaf-blade
moves.text_entry: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: dragon-dance
moves.text_entry: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

moves.name: rock-blast
moves.text_entry: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.

moves.name: shock-wave
moves.text_entry: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

moves.name: water-pulse
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: doom-desire
moves.text_entry: Two turns after this move is used, a concentrated bundle of light blasts the target.

moves.name: psycho-boost
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: roost
moves.text_entry: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: gravity
moves.text_entry: Enables Flying-type Pokémon or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves. Flying moves can’t be used.

moves.name: miracle-eye
moves.text_entry: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: wake-up-slap
moves.text_entry: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.

moves.name: hammer-arm
moves.text_entry: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

moves.name: gyro-ball
moves.text_entry: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: healing-wish
moves.text_entry: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

moves.name: brine
moves.text_entry: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

moves.name: natural-gift
moves.text_entry: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines the move’s type and power.

moves.name: feint
moves.text_entry: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: pluck
moves.text_entry: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: tailwind
moves.text_entry: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

moves.name: acupressure
moves.text_entry: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies’ stats.

moves.name: metal-burst
moves.text_entry: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

moves.name: u-turn
moves.text_entry: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: close-combat
moves.text_entry: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: payback
moves.text_entry: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled.

moves.name: assurance
moves.text_entry: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.

moves.name: embargo
moves.text_entry: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

moves.name: fling
moves.text_entry: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move’s power and effects depend on the item.

moves.name: psycho-shift
moves.text_entry: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.

moves.name: trump-card
moves.text_entry: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power.

moves.name: heal-block
moves.text_entry: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

moves.name: wring-out
moves.text_entry: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: power-trick
moves.text_entry: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

moves.name: gastro-acid
moves.text_entry: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

moves.name: lucky-chant
moves.text_entry: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits for five turns.

moves.name: me-first
moves.text_entry: The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use the target’s intended move with greater power. This move fails if it isn’t used first.

moves.name: copycat
moves.text_entry: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

moves.name: power-swap
moves.text_entry: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

moves.name: guard-swap
moves.text_entry: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

moves.name: punishment
moves.text_entry: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: last-resort
moves.text_entry: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

moves.name: worry-seed
moves.text_entry: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.

moves.name: sucker-punch
moves.text_entry: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

moves.name: toxic-spikes
moves.text_entry: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: heart-swap
moves.text_entry: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

moves.name: aqua-ring
moves.text_entry: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

moves.name: magnet-rise
moves.text_entry: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

moves.name: flare-blitz
moves.text_entry: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: force-palm
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: aura-sphere
moves.text_entry: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

moves.name: rock-polish
moves.text_entry: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

moves.name: poison-jab
moves.text_entry: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: dark-pulse
moves.text_entry: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: night-slash
moves.text_entry: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: aqua-tail
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

moves.name: seed-bomb
moves.text_entry: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

moves.name: air-slash
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: x-scissor
moves.text_entry: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

moves.name: bug-buzz
moves.text_entry: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: dragon-pulse
moves.text_entry: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

moves.name: dragon-rush
moves.text_entry: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: power-gem
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

moves.name: drain-punch
moves.text_entry: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: vacuum-wave
moves.text_entry: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: focus-blast
moves.text_entry: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target’s  Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: energy-ball
moves.text_entry: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: brave-bird
moves.text_entry: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: earth-power
moves.text_entry: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target’s  Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: switcheroo
moves.text_entry: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

moves.name: giga-impact
moves.text_entry: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: nasty-plot
moves.text_entry: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: bullet-punch
moves.text_entry: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

moves.name: avalanche
moves.text_entry: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

moves.name: ice-shard
moves.text_entry: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: shadow-claw
moves.text_entry: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: thunder-fang
moves.text_entry: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

moves.name: ice-fang
moves.text_entry: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

moves.name: fire-fang
moves.text_entry: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

moves.name: shadow-sneak
moves.text_entry: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

moves.name: mud-bomb
moves.text_entry: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: psycho-cut
moves.text_entry: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: zen-headbutt
moves.text_entry: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: mirror-shot
moves.text_entry: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: flash-cannon
moves.text_entry: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: rock-climb
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: defog
moves.text_entry: A strong wind blows away the target’s barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target’s evasiveness.

moves.name: trick-room
moves.text_entry: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

moves.name: draco-meteor
moves.text_entry: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: discharge
moves.text_entry: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

moves.name: lava-plume
moves.text_entry: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

moves.name: leaf-storm
moves.text_entry: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: power-whip
moves.text_entry: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the  like to harshly lash the target.

moves.name: rock-wrecker
moves.text_entry: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: cross-poison
moves.text_entry: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: gunk-shot
moves.text_entry: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: iron-head
moves.text_entry: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: magnet-bomb
moves.text_entry: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack never misses.

moves.name: stone-edge
moves.text_entry: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: captivate
moves.text_entry: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: stealth-rock
moves.text_entry: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: grass-knot
moves.text_entry: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: chatter
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.

moves.name: judgment
moves.text_entry: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move’s type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.

moves.name: bug-bite
moves.text_entry: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: charge-beam
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: wood-hammer
moves.text_entry: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: aqua-jet
moves.text_entry: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

moves.name: attack-order
moves.text_entry: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: defend-order
moves.text_entry: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: heal-order
moves.text_entry: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: head-smash
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

moves.name: double-hit
moves.text_entry: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: roar-of-time
moves.text_entry: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: spacial-rend
moves.text_entry: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: lunar-dance
moves.text_entry: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

moves.name: crush-grip
moves.text_entry: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move’s power.

moves.name: magma-storm
moves.text_entry: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: dark-void
moves.text_entry: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

moves.name: seed-flare
moves.text_entry: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: ominous-wind
moves.text_entry: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

moves.name: shadow-force
moves.text_entry: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

moves.name: hone-claws
moves.text_entry: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

moves.name: wide-guard
moves.text_entry: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

moves.name: guard-split
moves.text_entry: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

moves.name: power-split
moves.text_entry: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

moves.name: wonder-room
moves.text_entry: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

moves.name: psyshock
moves.text_entry: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

moves.name: venoshock
moves.text_entry: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

moves.name: autotomize
moves.text_entry: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

moves.name: rage-powder
moves.text_entry: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

moves.name: telekinesis
moves.text_entry: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

moves.name: magic-room
moves.text_entry: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.

moves.name: smack-down
moves.text_entry: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it’s hit.

moves.name: storm-throw
moves.text_entry: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

moves.name: flame-burst
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

moves.name: sludge-wave
moves.text_entry: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.

moves.name: quiver-dance
moves.text_entry: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

moves.name: heavy-slam
moves.text_entry: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: synchronoise
moves.text_entry: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

moves.name: electro-ball
moves.text_entry: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: soak
moves.text_entry: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.

moves.name: flame-charge
moves.text_entry: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

moves.name: coil
moves.text_entry: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

moves.name: low-sweep
moves.text_entry: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs, which lowers the target’s Speed stat.

moves.name: acid-spray
moves.text_entry: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: foul-play
moves.text_entry: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: simple-beam
moves.text_entry: The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to Simple.

moves.name: entrainment
moves.text_entry: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

moves.name: after-you
moves.text_entry: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

moves.name: round
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round to increase the power of the attack.

moves.name: echoed-voice
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.

moves.name: chip-away
moves.text_entry: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

moves.name: clear-smog
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

moves.name: stored-power
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: quick-guard
moves.text_entry: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

moves.name: ally-switch
moves.text_entry: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.

moves.name: scald
moves.text_entry: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: shell-smash
moves.text_entry: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

moves.name: heal-pulse
moves.text_entry: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: hex
moves.text_entry: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

moves.name: sky-drop
moves.text_entry: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

moves.name: shift-gear
moves.text_entry: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.

moves.name: circle-throw
moves.text_entry: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: incinerate
moves.text_entry: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

moves.name: quash
moves.text_entry: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

moves.name: acrobatics
moves.text_entry: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

moves.name: reflect-type
moves.text_entry: The user reflects the target’s type, making it the same type as the target.

moves.name: retaliate
moves.text_entry: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power is increased.

moves.name: final-gambit
moves.text_entry: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

moves.name: bestow
moves.text_entry: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item.

moves.name: inferno
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

moves.name: water-pledge
moves.text_entry: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, its power increases and a rainbow appears.

moves.name: fire-pledge
moves.text_entry: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.

moves.name: grass-pledge
moves.text_entry: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.

moves.name: volt-switch
moves.text_entry: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: struggle-bug
moves.text_entry: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

moves.name: bulldoze
moves.text_entry: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.

moves.name: frost-breath
moves.text_entry: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

moves.name: dragon-tail
moves.text_entry: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: work-up
moves.text_entry: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

moves.name: electroweb
moves.text_entry: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stat.

moves.name: wild-charge
moves.text_entry: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: drill-run
moves.text_entry: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: dual-chop
moves.text_entry: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: heart-stamp
moves.text_entry: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: horn-leech
moves.text_entry: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: sacred-sword
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

moves.name: razor-shell
moves.text_entry: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: heat-crash
moves.text_entry: The user slams its target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: leaf-tornado
moves.text_entry: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: steamroller
moves.text_entry: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: cotton-guard
moves.text_entry: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user’s Defense stat.

moves.name: night-daze
moves.text_entry: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: psystrike
moves.text_entry: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

moves.name: tail-slap
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

moves.name: hurricane
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: head-charge
moves.text_entry: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: gear-grind
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.

moves.name: searing-shot
moves.text_entry: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

moves.name: techno-blast
moves.text_entry: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The move’s type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

moves.name: relic-song
moves.text_entry: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

moves.name: secret-sword
moves.text_entry: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.

moves.name: glaciate
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.

moves.name: bolt-strike
moves.text_entry: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: blue-flare
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: fiery-dance
moves.text_entry: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: freeze-shock
moves.text_entry: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: ice-burn
moves.text_entry: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: snarl
moves.text_entry: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: icicle-crash
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: v-create
moves.text_entry: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

moves.name: fusion-flare
moves.text_entry: The user brings down a giant flame. This move’s power is increased when influenced by an enormous lightning bolt.

moves.name: fusion-bolt
moves.text_entry: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move’s power is increased when influenced by an enormous flame.

moves.name: flying-press
moves.text_entry: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

moves.name: mat-block
moves.text_entry: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.

moves.name: belch
moves.text_entry: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

moves.name: rototiller
moves.text_entry: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

moves.name: sticky-web
moves.text_entry: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.

moves.name: fell-stinger
moves.text_entry: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

moves.name: phantom-force
moves.text_entry: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

moves.name: trick-or-treat
moves.text_entry: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

moves.name: noble-roar
moves.text_entry: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: ion-deluge
moves.text_entry: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

moves.name: parabolic-charge
moves.text_entry: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

moves.name: forests-curse
moves.text_entry: The user puts a forest curse on the target. The target is now Grass type as well.

moves.name: petal-blizzard
moves.text_entry: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

moves.name: freeze-dry
moves.text_entry: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

moves.name: disarming-voice
moves.text_entry: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

moves.name: parting-shot
moves.text_entry: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

moves.name: topsy-turvy
moves.text_entry: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

moves.name: draining-kiss
moves.text_entry: The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: crafty-shield
moves.text_entry: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

moves.name: flower-shield
moves.text_entry: The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

moves.name: grassy-terrain
moves.text_entry: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.

moves.name: misty-terrain
moves.text_entry: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

moves.name: electrify
moves.text_entry: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type.

moves.name: play-rough
moves.text_entry: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

moves.name: fairy-wind
moves.text_entry: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

moves.name: moonblast
moves.text_entry: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: boomburst
moves.text_entry: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

moves.name: fairy-lock
