moves.text_entry: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

moves.name: kings-shield
moves.text_entry: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

moves.name: play-nice
moves.text_entry: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

moves.name: confide
moves.text_entry: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: diamond-storm
moves.text_entry: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the user’s Defense stat.

moves.name: steam-eruption
moves.text_entry: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: hyperspace-hole
moves.text_entry: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

moves.name: water-shuriken
moves.text_entry: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

moves.name: mystical-fire
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: spiky-shield
moves.text_entry: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.

moves.name: aromatic-mist
moves.text_entry: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

moves.name: eerie-impulse
moves.text_entry: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: venom-drench
moves.text_entry: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

moves.name: powder
moves.text_entry: The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target.

moves.name: geomancy
moves.text_entry: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

moves.name: magnetic-flux
moves.text_entry: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

moves.name: happy-hour
moves.text_entry: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

moves.name: electric-terrain
moves.text_entry: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

moves.name: dazzling-gleam
moves.text_entry: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

moves.name: celebrate
moves.text_entry: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

moves.name: hold-hands
moves.text_entry: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy.

moves.name: baby-doll-eyes
moves.text_entry: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

moves.name: nuzzle
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

moves.name: hold-back
moves.text_entry: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: infestation
moves.text_entry: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time.

moves.name: power-up-punch
moves.text_entry: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

moves.name: oblivion-wing
moves.text_entry: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: thousand-arrows
moves.text_entry: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.

moves.name: thousand-waves
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those hit can’t flee from battle.

moves.name: lands-wrath
moves.text_entry: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

moves.name: light-of-ruin
moves.text_entry: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: origin-pulse
moves.text_entry: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

moves.name: precipice-blades
moves.text_entry: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

moves.name: dragon-ascent
moves.text_entry: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.

moves.name: hyperspace-fury
moves.text_entry: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.

moves.name: breakneck-blitz--physical
moves.text_entry: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: breakneck-blitz--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: all-out-pummeling--physical
moves.text_entry: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: all-out-pummeling--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: supersonic-skystrike--physical
moves.text_entry: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets toward the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: supersonic-skystrike--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: acid-downpour--physical
moves.text_entry: The user creates a poisonous swamp using its Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: acid-downpour--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: tectonic-rage--physical
moves.text_entry: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: tectonic-rage--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: continental-crush--physical
moves.text_entry: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: continental-crush--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: savage-spin-out--physical
moves.text_entry: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: savage-spin-out--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: never-ending-nightmare--physical
moves.text_entry: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user’s Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: never-ending-nightmare--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: corkscrew-crash--physical
moves.text_entry: The user spins very fast and rams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: corkscrew-crash--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: inferno-overdrive--physical
moves.text_entry: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.

moves.name: inferno-overdrive--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: hydro-vortex--physical
moves.text_entry: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: hydro-vortex--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: bloom-doom--physical
moves.text_entry: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: bloom-doom--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: gigavolt-havoc--physical
moves.text_entry: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: gigavolt-havoc--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: shattered-psyche--physical
moves.text_entry: The user controls the target with its Z-Power and hurts the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: shattered-psyche--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: subzero-slammer--physical
moves.text_entry: The user dramatically drops the temperature using its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: subzero-slammer--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: devastating-drake--physical
moves.text_entry: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: devastating-drake--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: black-hole-eclipse--physical
moves.text_entry: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: black-hole-eclipse--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: twinkle-tackle--physical
moves.text_entry: The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

moves.name: twinkle-tackle--special
moves.text_entry: Dummy Data

moves.name: catastropika
moves.text_entry: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.

moves.name: shore-up
moves.text_entry: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

moves.name: first-impression
moves.text_entry: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: baneful-bunker
moves.text_entry: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

moves.name: spirit-shackle
moves.text_entry: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

moves.name: darkest-lariat
moves.text_entry: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

moves.name: sparkling-aria
moves.text_entry: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.

moves.name: ice-hammer
moves.text_entry: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

moves.name: floral-healing
moves.text_entry: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

moves.name: high-horsepower
moves.text_entry: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

moves.name: strength-sap
moves.text_entry: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

moves.name: solar-blade
moves.text_entry: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

moves.name: leafage
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

moves.name: spotlight
moves.text_entry: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

moves.name: toxic-thread
moves.text_entry: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target’s Speed stat.

moves.name: laser-focus
moves.text_entry: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

moves.name: gear-up
moves.text_entry: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

moves.name: throat-chop
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

moves.name: pollen-puff
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

moves.name: anchor-shot
moves.text_entry: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: psychic-terrain
moves.text_entry: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

moves.name: lunge
moves.text_entry: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

moves.name: fire-lash
moves.text_entry: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: power-trip
moves.text_entry: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

moves.name: burn-up
moves.text_entry: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

moves.name: speed-swap
moves.text_entry: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

moves.name: smart-strike
moves.text_entry: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

moves.name: purify
moves.text_entry: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

moves.name: revelation-dance
moves.text_entry: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.

moves.name: core-enforcer
moves.text_entry: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

moves.name: trop-kick
moves.text_entry: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

moves.name: instruct
moves.text_entry: The user instructs the target to use the target’s last move again.

moves.name: beak-blast
moves.text_entry: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.

moves.name: clanging-scales
moves.text_entry: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.

moves.name: dragon-hammer
moves.text_entry: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

moves.name: brutal-swing
moves.text_entry: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

moves.name: aurora-veil
moves.text_entry: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

moves.name: sinister-arrow-raid
moves.text_entry: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows using its Z-Power and shoots the target with full force.

moves.name: malicious-moonsault
moves.text_entry: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the target with full force.

moves.name: oceanic-operetta
moves.text_entry: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of  water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with  full force.

moves.name: guardian-of-alola
moves.text_entry: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.

moves.name: soul-stealing-7-star-strike
moves.text_entry: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches and kicks the target consecutively with full force.

moves.name: stoked-sparksurfer
moves.text_entry: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.

moves.name: pulverizing-pancake
moves.text_entry: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user, Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body energetically and attacks the target with full force.

moves.name: extreme-evoboost
moves.text_entry: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.

moves.name: genesis-supernova
moves.text_entry: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks the target with full force. The terrain will be charged with psychic energy.

moves.name: shell-trap
moves.text_entry: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: fleur-cannon
moves.text_entry: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: psychic-fangs
moves.text_entry: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

moves.name: stomping-tantrum
moves.text_entry: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

moves.name: shadow-bone
moves.text_entry: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: accelerock
moves.text_entry: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: liquidation
moves.text_entry: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

moves.name: prismatic-laser
moves.text_entry: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.

moves.name: spectral-thief
moves.text_entry: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

moves.name: sunsteel-strike
moves.text_entry: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target  regardless of its Abilities.

moves.name: moongeist-beam
moves.text_entry: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of  its Abilities.

moves.name: tearful-look
moves.text_entry: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: zing-zap
moves.text_entry: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: natures-madness
moves.text_entry: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.

moves.name: multi-attack
moves.text_entry: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

moves.name: 10-000-000-volt-thunderbolt
moves.text_entry: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: mind-blown
moves.text_entry: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

moves.name: plasma-fists
moves.text_entry: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

moves.name: photon-geyser
moves.text_entry: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.

moves.name: light-that-burns-the-sky
moves.text_entry: This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage— whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma.  This move ignores the target’s Ability.

moves.name: searing-sunraze-smash
moves.text_entry: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.

moves.name: menacing-moonraze-maelstrom
moves.text_entry: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lunala, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.

moves.name: lets-snuggle-forever
moves.text_entry: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu, punches the target with full force.

moves.name: splintered-stormshards
moves.text_entry: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc, attacks the target with full force. This move negates the effect on the battlefield.

moves.name: clangorous-soulblaze
moves.text_entry: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks the opposing Pokémon with full force. This move boosts the user’s stats.
